value.title: Work with mutable and partial data in Azure Cache for Redis
value.excerpt: Learn how to create transactions, manage memory, and use the cache-aside pattern with Azure Cache for Redis

value.title: How to choose which services to use in Azure | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: In this video, Azure MVP Barry Luijbregts chats with Scott Hanselman about how he goes about choosing the right services in Azure to run his applications and store his data.   For more information, see:  • Overview of Azure services https://aka.ms/azfr/435/01  • Pluralsight course: Microsoft Azure for

value.title: How to create an Azure SQL database | Azure Portal Series
value.excerpt: In this video of the Azure Portal “How To” Series, you will learn how to create an Azure SQL Database in the Azure Portal and how you can be more productive in Azure.    Try out these features in the Azure portal: https://portal.azure.com   Keep connected on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AzurePortal

value.title: How to get started with Azure API Management | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to get started with Azure API Management, a service that helps protect and manage your APIs.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips     Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today

value.title: How to use Azure Bastion to connect securely to your Azure VMs | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Using a bastion host can help limit threats such as port scanning and other types of malware targeting your VMs. Ashish Jain joins Scott Hanselman to show how Azure Bastion gives you secure and seamless RDP and SSH access to your virtual machines. Now you can securely access your VMs over SSL from the

value.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras
value.excerpt: Keras is a high-level neural networks API, written in Python, that runs on top of other deep learning tools such as TensorFlow. This module uses Keras to build a neural network that scores text, such as user reviews for sentiment.

images.title: Analyze the sentiment of reviews with Keras

value.title: Build and store container images with Azure Container Registry
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework - Cost optimization
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the cost optimization pillar of the Microsoft Azure Well-Architected Framework to design a cloud-based architecture that is efficient, eliminates waste, and gives you full visibility into where your money is spent on cloud resources.

value.title: Build a scalable application with virtual machine scale sets
value.excerpt: Enable your application to automatically adjust to changes in load while minimizing costs with virtual machine scale sets.

value.title: Build a web app with Blazor WebAssembly and Visual Studio Code
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up your development environment and build your first WebAssembly app with Blazor, Visual Studio Code, and C#.

value.title: Capture and view page load times in your Azure web app with Application Insights
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll configure Application Insights and use it to study page load data for an Azure web app.

value.title: Configure security policies to manage data
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up policies to classify, retain, and protect your cloud-based data.

value.title: Deploy and run a containerized web app with Azure App Service
value.excerpt: Discover how to create a Docker image and store it in the Azure Container Registry, then use Azure App Service to deploy a web application based on the image.

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and error.

value.title: Export large amounts of data from Azure by using Azure Import/Export
value.excerpt: Learn how and when to use Azure Import/Export to copy large amounts of data from Azure

value.title: Improve incident response with alerting on Azure
value.excerpt: Respond to incidents and activities in your infrastructure through alerting capabilities in Azure Monitor.

value.title: Integrate data with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline
value.excerpt: Integrate data with Azure Data Factory or Azure Synapse Pipeline

value.title: Introduction to Linux on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the unique benefits of running Linux on Azure, and how to run Linux-based applications and workloads in the cloud with Azure.

value.title: Introduction to high-performance computing (HPC) on Azure
value.excerpt: Discover the services available on Azure for your high-performance computing workloads.

value.title: Introduction to Site Reliability Engineering (SRE)
value.excerpt: Learn about SRE, an engineering discipline that helps you sustainably achieve the appropriate level of reliability in your systems, services, and products.

value.title: Introduction to Transact-SQL

value.title: Introduction to Git
value.excerpt: Use Git to track changes and collaborate with other developers

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organization’s security posture.

value.title: Manage Agile software delivery plans across teams
value.excerpt: Learn to optimize delivery efficiency by improving work plan visibility across teams.

value.title: Move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box family
value.excerpt: Learn how to move large amounts of data to the cloud by using Azure Data Box devices.

value.title: Make predictions from complex data with neural networks
value.excerpt: Use neural network models to make predictions. Change neural network structures to refine predictions using TensorFlow and Keras.
